About Us

EBA was founded in 2016 by Michael Poulos and Patrick Lowe. Michael and Patrick are international businessmen from Canada with over 20 cumulative years of teaching experience. Understanding and appreciating the value of English in the workplace, their objective was to offer programs and courses focused on a superior educational experience for business professionals in Spain. As a result, Michael and Patrick founded EBA, with the common goal of preparing professionals to work in an English environment.

About Our Founders

Michael Poulos

Co-founder

Michael Poulos is a Canadian with a BBA in Marketing and Communications and an MBA in Sports Management. Having worked in various international businesses as well as having taught English in France, Taiwan and Spain over the last 10 years, he has gained a great understanding of the importance of English as a second language as well as the advantage of English in the business workplace. Furthermore, having been both a teacher and a student of languages, he knows what it takes to achieve success with a second language and has transferred that knowledge into EBA‚Äôs course structure.

Patrick Lowe

Co-founder

Patrick is a British / Canadian with over a decade of experience in education and business development. He has held positions within the education and community development sectors throughout Switzerland, France, Taiwan, Spain and Canada. With an eclectic mix of skills captured from his MBA and during his travels to over 50 countries, Patrick has a tremendous passion for sharing best practices, teaching and learning from others. EBA‚Äôs innovative and interactive teaching methods will engage people from all walks of life, no matter the level of English.

About Our Teachers

At EBA we pride ourselves on our selection process to ensure that we are providing you with the best quality teacher for your needs. We provide teachers of different ages, nationalities and accents based on your preferences that are all focused on taking your English to the next level.
